import React from 'react'; import { useTrail, animated } from '@react-spring/web'; import ProblemPage from '../ProblemPage/ProblemPage'; const Problem1 = ({ handleProblemCompletion, isSolved, savedAnswer, themeColors }) => { const items = [ "nyc subway signage", "meme", "scientific journal", "film script", "stop sign" ]; const trail = useTrail(items.length, { from: { opacity: 0, transform: 'translateY(20px)' }, to: { opacity: 1, transform: 'translateY(0px)' }, config: { mass: 1, tension: 280, friction: 20 } }); return (

Here are some hints to help you solve this puzzle:

nyc subway signage
memes
scientific journals
film script
stop sign
Each item uses an iconic font.
Use the first letter of each font name to get the answer.
After finding the font name that is used for each item, use the first letter of each font name to get the answer.

nyc subway signage ‚Üí helvetica
memes ‚Üí impact
scientific journals ‚Üí times new roman
film script ‚Üí courier
stop sign ‚Üí highway gothic

Answer: HITCH
} >
{trail.map((style, index) => ( {items[index]} ))}
); }; export default Problem1;
